page.title: 01WEST COKER AREA GENERAL VIEW
page.content: {WEST COKER THE LARGEST OF THE THREE VILLAGES, POST OFFICE,2 PUBS, POLICE STATION, CHURCH,CHAPEL,MOTEL,GARAGE,A VARIETY OF SHOPS AND SERVICES. {EAST CHINNOCK POST OFFICE,PUB,GARAGE,CHURCH. {HARDINGTON POST OFFICE,2 PUBS,CHURCH. {GENERAL VIEW THE AREA CONSISTS OF THESE 3 SMALL VILLAGES SURROUNDED BY FARM LAND WHICH IS PREDOMINANTLY PASTURE.THE MAIN 'A 30' TRUNK ROAD BISECTS WEST COKER AND EAST CHINNOCK, THIS CAUSES TRAFFIC PROBLEMS IN SUMMER,BUT INCREASES BUSINESS. THERE IS A MIXTURE OF OLD AND NEW HOUSING,OLDER HOUSES MADE OF LOCAL OR HAM STONE MANY WITH THATCHED ROOFS. MOST EMPLOYMENT IS IN YEOVIL, 3 MILES AWAY.
